message: Hello Bob, it's great to connect with you about this opportunity.  Given the value this brings to businesses like yours, I'm offering it at $1,100,000. I'm confident this is a fair starting point for discussions.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the value this product can bring to my business.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the value, but my initial offer already reflects a significant discount on its true potential.  To move this forward, I can adjust my price to $1,050,000. This is my best offer and reflects the value this product will bring to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to adjust the price, but $1,050,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $950,000. I believe that's a fair price for the value this product will bring to my business.
Bob, I appreciate our continued discussion, however, we are running short on time and need to make a decision. I can come down to $1,025,000, but this is my absolute final offer.
I understand that time is of the essence, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $925,000, which is the lowest I'm willing to go. I hope we can come to an agreement.
